name: In the Valley of Stars
description:
# Alpha Testing version for our grade 12 computer science class

# By Oliver Long  and Mason Zhou

Programming: Oliver and Mason

Loremaster: Mason

This game centers around exploring a toy solar system at your own pace. Read text logs scattered around various planets and watch as planets transform on a set timer. It is recommended to restart in order to see the timed events.

--- Story ---

The story follows Atoyan Raichiyo, the daughter of a famous space explorer. 

Her mother disappears. She goes to find her in the valley of stars.

--- Controls ---

WASD - Move

Mouse - Rotate camera

Shift - Thrust upwards

Shift + Space - Strong thrust upwards

Ctrl - Thrust downwards

Space - Jump

Click on planet - Target that planet

Space when you have a target - Match that target's velocity (Hover yourself above the target)

E - read text / pick up object

G - Launch Drone

R- Restart game
